reporter_caption.center: HUDNALL v. TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY, 244 La. 123 (1963)

caption.center: MRS. GAIL MARIE HUDNALL, WIFE OF/AND JERRY HUDNALL, v. THE TRAVELERS

opinion.posture: IN RE: THE TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY AND THE LOUISIANA COCA-COLA BOTTLING COMPANY, LTD., APPLYING FOR CERTIORARI, OR WRIT OF REVIEW, TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FOURTH CIRCUIT, PARISH OF PLAQUEMINES.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ refused. On the facts found by the Court of Appeal we find no error of law in its judgment.

[3] I am of the view that a writ should be granted in this case solely and only because of the fact that this Court granted a writ in Pilie v. National Food Stores, Inc., La., 150 So.2d 586, which case presents, in my view, the same legal question.
